column5: Cabin sleeps 4 with a queen bed, queen sleeper sofa. It's on 2 acres along Hwy 39 and the Guadalupe River with several other 1920's era historical cabins. It was purchased & finished to provide the Tiny Home Experience with a mixture of old and new. There's a full kitchen, Satellite TV and Wi-Fi. The cabin has a gas grill and relaxing swing out front for guest use. The inside dimensions are 12 x 24 with a 6' front deck. Several other cabins are located on property, and canoes for guest use!
